text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Kakinami was born on May 7, 1966. On September 6, 1981, when she was 15 years old, she debuted for the Japan national team against England. She played 4 games for Japan until 1984. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1981 1 0 1982 0 0 1983 0 0 1984 3 0 Total 4 0 ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan women's international footballers
title: Kaoru Kakinami
